paragraphs.body: ${link_0} launched surface-to-air rocks to prevent ${link_1} from trespassing on the ${link_2}.
paragraphs.text: Guards launched surface-to-air rocks to prevent Team Avatar from trespassing on the Earth Kingdom Royal Palace.

paragraphs.body: Surface-to-air rocks, also known as surface-to-surface rocks when used alternatively, are projectiles used as the primary weapons of the ${link_0}. Usually launched from the watchtowers outside of the ${link_1}, these large earthen frusta are used both as offensive and defensive armaments.
paragraphs.text: Surface-to-air rocks, also known as surface-to-surface rocks when used alternatively, are projectiles used as the primary weapons of the Royal Earthbender Guards. Usually launched from the watchtowers outside of the Earth Kingdom Royal Palace, these large earthen frusta are used both as offensive and defensive armaments.

paragraphs.body: The purpose of surface-to-air rocks is to prevent intruders from entering the royal palace. Primarily used as surface-to-surface rocks to halt invaders on foot, the weapons can also effectively be used to ward off an aerial assault. The rocks are large frusta prepared by the dozens. When launched, these projectiles are flipped so that the small jutted side impacts the target first. This is advantageous, as the rock's positioning makes it less likely for intruders to dodge the attack.
paragraphs.text: The purpose of surface-to-air rocks is to prevent intruders from entering the royal palace. Primarily used as surface-to-surface rocks to halt invaders on foot, the weapons can also effectively be used to ward off an aerial assault. The rocks are large frusta prepared by the dozens. When launched, these projectiles are flipped so that the small jutted side impacts the target first. This is advantageous, as the rock's positioning makes it less likely for intruders to dodge the attack.

paragraphs.body: Once possible threats to the ${link_0}'s safety are spotted, several of these rocks are lined up and fired in quick succession so as to effectively prevent invaders from bypassing the palace's defenses.
paragraphs.text: Once possible threats to the earth monarch's safety are spotted, several of these rocks are lined up and fired in quick succession so as to effectively prevent invaders from bypassing the palace's defenses.

paragraphs.body: ${link_0} destroyed an incoming surface-to-air rock while traveling on ${link_1}.
paragraphs.text: Aang destroyed an incoming surface-to-air rock while traveling on Appa.

paragraphs.body: After arriving in ${link_0}, ${link_1} set off to find Earth King ${link_2} to gain his support for a ${link_3} of the ${link_4}. However, while attempting to do so, the team faced a variety of problems, including a ${link_5} which kept the Earth King from involving himself in any military actions. In a last-ditch effort to notify Earth King Kuei of an upcoming ${link_6} that would render ${link_7} powerless, Team Avatar decided to forsake every diplomatic approach and breach the palace by force. Immediately after entering the stronghold's perimeters, Royal Earthbender Guards targeted ${link_8} and fired several stone frusta at him. The ${link_9} dodged several of the projectiles and those he could not dodge were destroyed by ${link_10} through the use of ${link_11}; Team Avatar managed to land with relative ease, continuing on toward the palace.
paragraphs.text: After arriving in Ba Sing Se, Team Avatar set off to find Earth King Kuei to gain his support for a planned invasion of the Fire Nation Capital. However, while attempting to do so, the team faced a variety of problems, including a conspiracy which kept the Earth King from involving himself in any military actions. In a last-ditch effort to notify Earth King Kuei of an upcoming solar eclipse that would render firebenders powerless, Team Avatar decided to forsake every diplomatic approach and breach the palace by force. Immediately after entering the stronghold's perimeters, Royal Earthbender Guards targeted Appa and fired several stone frusta at him. The bison dodged several of the projectiles and those he could not dodge were destroyed by Aang through the use of earthbending; Team Avatar managed to land with relative ease, continuing on toward the palace.
